关于白细胞如何清除病原体的新见解生动的新图像在细胞生物学世界中形成：想象细菌粘附在细胞表面，也许是在受伤或伤口的部位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/new-insights-into-how-how-white-blood-cells-cells-clear-parthogens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/new-insights-into-how-how-white-blood-cells-cells-clear-clear-pathogens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c24e444d9-82b5-44df-a452-f1555551aec188 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 23:09:51 -0500 New insights into how white blood cells clear pathogens
Fairjourney Biologics收购了Charles River Laboratories南旧金山工厂抗体发现和优化的领导者Fairjourney Biologics SA今天宣布已从Charles River Laboratories International，Inc。收购了南旧金山现场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/fairjourney-biologics-acquires-acquires-charles-river-liver-laboratories-south-south-south-san-san-francisco-facility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/fairjourney-biologics-acquires-acquires-charles-river-liver-laboratories-south-south-san-san-san-francisco-facility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0cf1bb9-1A7E-4F47-B56F-E1FE5571B250 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 22:55:00 -0500 Fairjourney Biologics acquires Charles River Laboratories South San Francisco facility
Centauri Therapeutics选择了第一个临床候选者，用于革兰氏阴性细菌感染的免疫治疗Centauri Therapeutics Limited（Centauri）是一家免疫疗法公司，其独特且专有的平台技术适用于广泛的治疗迹象，今天宣布选择其在ABX-01计划中首位临床候选者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/centauri-therapeutics-selects-first-clinical-candidate-for-for-mmunotherapeutic-treatment-gram-gram-neger-gram-negration-negration-negration-negration-negation-negration-negation-negration-negation-negration-negation-bacterial-bacterial-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/centauri-therapeutics-selects-first-clinical-candidate-for-for-mmunotherapeutic-treatment-gram-gram-dram-negration-negration-negation-negation-negation-negation-negation-negation-bacterial-bacterial-bacterial-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb176a7-2f35-44a7-a6a4-918A5E04B019 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 22:48:00 -0500 Centauri Therapeutics selects first clinical candidate, for immunotherapeutic treatment of Gram-negative bacterial infections
早期怀孕早期叶酸剂量提高儿童的口头和行为能力根据今天于2025年3月4日发布的初步研究，在怀孕的头三个月期间服用更高剂量的叶酸是安全的，并且与六岁的儿童的口头能力以及改善的行为能力有关，该研究将于2025年3月4日发布，该研究将在美国神经病学会的第77届年度会议上于4月5-9日举行，于2025年4月5-9日在Sanigo和Onli举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/higher-foric-acid-doses-in----in------------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/higher-folic-acid-doses-in------------------------------------------------- improve-verbal-verbal-and-behavioral-skillal-skills-in-Children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79ee32d-8b61-44f4-93ec-3EC-3FD09979904F1 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:26:15 -0500 Higher folic acid doses in early pregnancy improve verbal and behavioral skills in children
研究人员通过将大脑信号解码为文本培训AI阅读思维科学家开发了Brainllm，该模型使用fMRI和AI将大脑活动转化为自然语言，表现优于先前的基于分类的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-train-ai-train-train-to-read-mindse28094by-decoding-decoding-brain-brain-signals-into-into-text.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/researchers-train-ai-train-train-tro-to-read-mindse28094by-decoding-decoding-decoding-brain-brain-signals-into-into-text.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93dda1a1-4852-4852-4b50-8692-12c7915b2641 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:21:00 -0500 Researchers train AI to read minds—by decoding brain signals into text
研究揭示了焦虑和冷漠如何影响决策在不确定的情况下做出决定是日常生活的一部分。明尼苏达大学医学院的新研究发现了焦虑和冷漠（两个常见但截然不同的情绪状态）在人们学习和做出决策方面产生了根本不同的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-reveals-how-anxiety-and-apathy-apathy-apthy-aptathy-aptect-decision-making.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/study-reveals-how-anxiety-and-apathy-apathy-apthy-apthy-aptect-decision-making.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3eb7968f-9165-4935-4935-aff1-aff1-aff1-b7a4624999df9 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:20:35 -0500 Study reveals how anxiety and apathy affect decision-making
良好的睡眠卫生在青年脑震荡恢复中起着至关重要的作用全国儿童医院的研究人员发现，在脑震荡恢复方面，睡眠很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/good-sleep-hygiene-plays-crucial-role--on-youth-conconcussion-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/good-sleep-hygiene-plays-crucial-concial-role-in-youth-conconcussion-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf872503-a993-444b-9eee-dfa8d681e7b5 Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:17:06 -0500 Good sleep hygiene plays crucial role in youth concussion recovery
澳大利亚原住民的哮喘和过敏率更高昆士兰州大学的研究人员发现，与其他澳大利亚人相比，原住民在医院患有哮喘和其他相关疾病的可能性是医院的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/asthma-and-andergy-rates-rates-higher-mong-mong-first-nation-people-in-australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/asthma-and-higher-higher-------------------------------------rustralia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a679a3f-5b2b-4d58-4d58-86b1-9b1-9b4c91739b1b Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:12:26 -0500 Asthma and allergy rates higher among First Nations people in Australia
残疾人成年人的处方药滥用率更高根据西弗吉尼亚大学的研究，滥用处方药的可能性几乎是没有残疾的成年人的两倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/prescription-drug-misuse-rates-rates-rates-higher-mong-among-apruts-with-disabilities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250304/prescription-drug-misuse-rates-rates-rates-higher-mong-among-apruts-with-disabilities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E27E665-6EB3-47E5-9F35-4492C5B7903F Tue, 04 Mar 2025 21:06:00 -0500 Prescription drug misuse rates higher among adults with disabilities
